 I'll have to listen after I get home tonight. I have been with Chris when=
 Edison (or someone claiming to be Edison) came through, as well as some of=
 his spirit techs, and I could hear them, and have the tape, it's both side=
s of 90 minute rape. One problem is the voices are often severely distorted=
, or made out of noise.   You might try making contact with Misty's ST meth=
od, where you simply tune a radio across the band, AM or FM, slowly by hand=
, while recording directly from the speaker. It's pretty much the same as t=
he box, the box just automates the process. i used to think I knew how it w=
orks, but all I know is that if we supply something to form voices out of, =
they talk!  Some have problems with Moon, and I don't know if any of it is =
justified or not.   I think that dieclaimer about it being for entertainmen=
t is to avoid legal intanglements, and debunkers. Kinda like the guys the s=
ell herbal cures that work, but the law prevents them from saying so.  I ca=
n say only that the box works, something talks that is not from radio broad=
casts, but what it is, is open to debate. I can't say it's all spirit conta=
ct, it seems to be eveything out in the ether that comes though at one time=
 or another, and there seems to be an infinte number of levels, layers, or =
demensions--positive and negative--it gets confusing. This voice is meant t=
o show it's not broadcast fragments, yet who it is remains an unknown.
 
 F=
rank-S

<BR> I'll have to listen after I get home tonight. I =
have been with Chris when Edison (or someone claiming to be Edison) came th=
rough, as well as some of his spirit techs, and I could hear them, and=
 have the tape, it's both sides of 90 minute rape. One problem is the voice=
s are often severely distorted, or made out of noise. <BR> <BR>&n=
bsp;You might try making contact with Misty's ST method, where you simply t=
une a radio across the band, AM or FM, slowly by hand, while recording dire=
ctly from the speaker. It's pretty much the same as the box, the box just a=
utomates the process. i used to think I knew how it works, but all I k=
now is that if we supply something to form voices out of, they talk!<BR>&nb=
sp;<BR> Some have problems with Moon, and I don't know if any of it is=
 justified or not. <BR> <BR> I think that dieclaimer about it bei=
ng for entertainment is to avoid legal intanglements, and debunkers. Kinda =
like the guys the sell herbal cures that work, but the law prevents them fr=
om saying so.<BR> <BR> I can say only that the box works, somethi=
ng talks that is not from radio broadcasts, but what it is, is op=
en to debate. I can't say it's all spirit contact, it seems to be evey=
thing out in the ether that comes though at one time or another, and there =
seems to be an infinte number of levels, layers, or demensions--positi=
ve and negative--it gets confusing. This voice is meant to show it's not br=
oadcast fragments, yet who it is remains an unknown.<BR>
 <BR>
 F=
rank-S<BR><BR><BR>
